title: Shards in Loot are broken
body:
I wanted to take Riot's advice and disenchant or reroll the shards I have that I don't want/can't use. However, my shards appear to be broken. Is there a problem with the loot system right now? Because when I click on my shards, nothing happens. Right click, left click, doesn't matter. I don't even get the menu that gives me options (disenchant, activate rental, unlock, etc.).

Is this a temporary issue? A bug? Or did I miss my chance? Has loot been locked in preparation for preseason? If anyone from Riot can tell me what's happening, that would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.

Edit: Nevermind. It seems to be working like it should now. No idea why it wasn't working earlier.

replies.body: It's possible your loot menu just went a little wonky after a game or something. It happens sometimes if the loot portion sort of loses it's connection with the server. Usually, it's just a minor problem that will fix itself after a relog or simply switching to and from the loot screen.
Thanks for getting back to me. I still don't know what the issue was, but it worked itself out somehow. When I logged back in it was fine again.
